name: Rag Doll Joe
description:
Rag Doll Joe is a casual based game where you must toss the Rag doll Joe into objects on screen.



OBJECTIVE:

- Throw Rag Doll Joe into the objects on screen

- For every object knocked off screen you will gain points

- On achieving three stars you will proceed to the next level




FEATURES TO COME:

- Add additional Rag Doll characters

- Additional levels

- Character ( Rag Doll ) Customization

- Achievements

- And more!
